text: Hojjat Adeli from Ohio State University, Columbus, OH was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for contributions to computational intelligence in infrastructure engineering and also an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Ohio State University faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Hojjat Adeli
